formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Taxable income (Detailed mode): TI = max(0, GI - Adj - DedEx) Rate by year: r(y) = { 0.047 if y = 2024; 0.044 if y = 2025; 0.040 if y ≥ 2026 } Mississippi tax (piecewise): T(y, TI) = { 0 if TI ≤ 10{,}000; r(y) · (TI - 10{,}000) if TI > 10{,}000 } Effective tax rate (relative to gross income GI, when GI > 0): ETR = T / GI Marginal tax rate: MTR = { 0 if TI ≤ 10{,}000; r(y) if TI > 10{,}000 }

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
